company.name: MedlinePlus
company.summary: MedlinePlus offers a search-based Web service that provides access to MedlinePlus health topic data in XML format. Using the Web service, software developers can build applications that utilize MedlinePlus health topic information. The service accepts keyword searches as requests and returns relevant health topics in ranked order. Keyword searches may be limited to specific fields. The service als
company.details: MedlinePlus offers a search-based Web service that provides access to MedlinePlus health topic data in XML format. Using the Web service, software developers can build applications that utilize MedlinePlus health topic information. The service accepts keyword searches as requests and returns relevant health topics in ranked order. Keyword searches may be limited to specific fields. The service also returns health topic summaries, search result snippets, external links, and other associated data.

company.name: AT&T
company.summary: AT&T Developer Program is the API platform for all AT&T devices and the AT&T network.  AT&T provides device, call, location, messaging, speech, notifications, payments as well as advertising and healthcare solutions across multiple devices and mobile operating systems.
company.details: AT&T Developer Program is the API platform for all AT&T devices and the AT&T network.  AT&T provides device, call, location, messaging, speech, notifications, payments as well as advertising and healthcare solutions across multiple devices and mobile operating systems.

company.name: Dossia
company.summary: Dossia Application Programming Interface - The Dossia API allows client applications to securely read and update a Dossia participant's health data. Developers can read and write medications, allergies, immunizations and other XML document types.
company.details: Dossia Application Programming Interface - The Dossia API allows client applications to securely read and update a Dossia participant's health data. Developers can read and write medications, allergies, immunizations and other XML document types.

company.name: Practice Fusion
company.summary: Practice Fusion's Electronic Health Record was developed from the real workflows of office-based physicians. Our free, web-based EHR software is fully-featured enabling you to effectively manage your practice. Use our system to schedule an appointment, complete a medical chart during a visit, send a prescription with our e-prescribing feature and bill for your practice. Our Electronic Health Recor
company.details: Practice Fusion's Electronic Health Record was developed from the real workflows of office-based physicians. Our free, web-based EHR software is fully-featured enabling you to effectively manage your practice. Use our system to schedule an appointment, complete a medical chart during a visit, send a prescription with our e-prescribing feature and bill for your practice. Our Electronic Health Record software is so easy to use, you can sign up and start charting immediately.

company.name: Eligible
company.summary: The Eligible Health Insurance API is a service that lets users lookup information on over 700 insurance companies. Information available includes patients active versus inactive status, coinsurance, copayment, deductible, health spending balance and specialty specific information such as MRI and diagnostic labs. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.
company.details: The Eligible Health Insurance API is a service that lets users lookup information on over 700 insurance companies. Information available includes patients active versus inactive status, coinsurance, copayment, deductible, health spending balance and specialty specific information such as MRI and diagnostic labs. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.

company.name: Aetna CarePass
company.summary: The CarePass Developer portal offers unique and powerful APIs from Aetna, HHS, and other innovators in the health and wellness community, plus all of the support you’ll need to work with these APIs.
company.details: The CarePass Developer portal offers unique and powerful APIs from Aetna, HHS, and other innovators in the health and wellness community, plus all of the support you’ll need to work with these APIs.

company.name: Doctoralia
company.summary: The world's biggest health professionals database with more than 2.3 million professionals and health centers. Search by location, insurance, specialty or keywords. Results are returned by geolocation or relevance. Users can book an appointment with a doctor through your website or app without any cost to you or the patient with full addresses, phone numbers, insurance info, specialties and rating
company.details: The world's biggest health professionals database with more than 2.3 million professionals and health centers. Search by location, insurance, specialty or keywords. Results are returned by geolocation or relevance. Users can book an appointment with a doctor through your website or app without any cost to you or the patient with full addresses, phone numbers, insurance info, specialties and ratings. All content is being constantly updated by Doctoralia.

company.name: HealthData.gov
company.summary: The HealthData.gov API is used to provide software developers programmatic access to the contents of our data catalog. The API can be used to find recently added datasets, to search the catalog, to download the contents of the catalog for analysis, or to build a new data catalog tool.
company.details: The HealthData.gov API is used to provide software developers programmatic access to the contents of our data catalog. The API can be used to find recently added datasets, to search the catalog, to download the contents of the catalog for analysis, or to build a new data catalog tool.

company.name: Healthfinder.gov
company.summary:
In an ongoing effort to implement the Federal Digital Strategy, healthfinder.gov is connecting Web site editors and developers with the tools they need to host and share the Government’s reliable health and wellness information.
All healthfinder.gov APIs are available to output English and Spanish content. To begin using a healthfinder.gov API, please register using the form to the right. A
company.details:
In an ongoing effort to implement the Federal Digital Strategy, healthfinder.gov is connecting Web site editors and developers with the tools they need to host and share the Government’s reliable health and wellness information.
All healthfinder.gov APIs are available to output English and Spanish content. To begin using a healthfinder.gov API, please register using the form to the right. A confirmation that includes your unique API key will be sent to your email address. Please save the email for future reference.

company.name: Healthnotes
company.summary:
Healthnotes is the industry-leading natural health database used by household names like Walmart, GNC, and Whole Foods to deliver self-care health tips and recommendations to their shoppers.
Healthnotes is the industry-leading content source for consumer self-care wellness decisions. Through the API you will find access to this consumer-oriented content and the powerful contextual data connections
company.details:
Healthnotes is the industry-leading natural health database used by household names like Walmart, GNC, and Whole Foods to deliver self-care health tips and recommendations to their shoppers.
Healthnotes is the industry-leading content source for consumer self-care wellness decisions. Through the API you will find access to this consumer-oriented content and the powerful contextual data connections that allow for sophisticated integrations personalized to your users' needs.

company.name: HealthTap
company.summary: At HealthTap, we believe that the way to improve health care is through innovation and teamwork. Our APIs grant access to HealthTap's powerful wealth of knowledge and reputation data, an ever-expanding bank of high-quality content created by thousands of U.S.-licensed physicians every day. Connect with us to power your apps with the world's' first Interactive Health engine.
company.details: At HealthTap, we believe that the way to improve health care is through innovation and teamwork. Our APIs grant access to HealthTap's powerful wealth of knowledge and reputation data, an ever-expanding bank of high-quality content created by thousands of U.S.-licensed physicians every day. Connect with us to power your apps with the world's' first Interactive Health engine.

company.name: HIPAASpace
company.summary: HIPAASpace is an online service, providing a set of tools, including the validation of HIPAA EDI documents for conformance to Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) regulations, NPI number validation, NPI registry lookup, and many more HIPAA-related services.
company.details: HIPAASpace is an online service, providing a set of tools, including the validation of HIPAA EDI documents for conformance to Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) regulations, NPI number validation, NPI registry lookup, and many more HIPAA-related services.

company.name: National Library of Medicine
company.summary: DIRLINE API offers a RESTful Web Service API that allows users to search the DIRLINE database with keywords. Using this API, software developers can smoothly integrate DIRLINE data into their own applications.  The Division of Specialized Information Services (SIS) produces information resources on a range of topics covering toxicology, environmental health,  HIV/AIDS,  drug and con
company.details: DIRLINE API offers a RESTful Web Service API that allows users to search the DIRLINE database with keywords. Using this API, software developers can smoothly integrate DIRLINE data into their own applications.  The Division of Specialized Information Services (SIS) produces information resources on a range of topics covering toxicology, environmental health,  HIV/AIDS,  drug and consumer product information, and disaster/emergency preparedness and response. The Toxicology and Environmental Health Information Program (TEHIP) component covers toxicology, environmental health, and chemistry.

company.name: The Cancer
company.summary: CancerAPI.org is the home of CANAPI, a platform for building applications focused on helping users find, follow and share information about emerging innovations in the fight against cancer
company.details: CancerAPI.org is the home of CANAPI, a platform for building applications focused on helping users find, follow and share information about emerging innovations in the fight against cancer

company.name: Walgreens
company.summary: Walgreens (www.walgreens.com) is the nation’s largest drugstore chain with fiscal 2010 sales of $67 billion. The company operates 7,689 drugstores in all 50 states, the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico. Each day, Walgreens provides nearly 6 million customers the most convenient, multi-channel access to consumer goods and services and trusted, cost-effective pharmacy, health and wellness
company.details: Walgreens (www.walgreens.com) is the nation’s largest drugstore chain with fiscal 2010 sales of $67 billion. The company operates 7,689 drugstores in all 50 states, the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico. Each day, Walgreens provides nearly 6 million customers the most convenient, multi-channel access to consumer goods and services and trusted, cost-effective pharmacy, health and wellness services and advice in communities across America.
